Name: Little Richard's Panzer Brigade
Details: Little Richard's Panzer Brigade was formed from a House Davion military unit named the Panzer Brigade.  They later took contracts with House Kurita, Liao, and Marik.  The unit consists of a regiment of BattleMechs and a regiment of combat vehicles with aerospace and infantry support.  They are currently in the employ of the Capellan Confederation.
